name: S.H.Figuarts KAMEN RIDER GAVV CAKING FORM
description:
"Caking! Amazing!"

Now available from S.H.Figuarts Series is Gavv from the series 'Kamen Rider Gavv', in the form he gained new power from his new compatriots -- Kamen Rider Gavv Caking Form!
										The distinctive design with cake motif is faithfully recreated in this figure. The gorgeous coloring is reproduced with gold and metallic red dressing the white base. Two different color tones of gold are used for the body, to emphasize the differences of color on each area. PVC sheet is used for the cape on his back to ensure the appearance stays true to the drama. 
Various parts of the figure are shaped to maintain the carefully sculpted look of the character, from the intricately shaped head, which resembles a crown, to the whip accents on various parts of the body. The compound eyes are made with clear parts for an appearance very same as what is seen in the drama. 
Also included is his special weapon he uses during Caking Form, the Gavvwhipir. The whip portion is reproduced using soft material for a look similar to that in the show. Two versions of the Caking Gochizo used to transform into Caking Form are included as well: one open, loaded on Gavv's stomach, and one closed, which can be set on the Gavvwhipir. 
The figure's joint structure preserves the natural lines of the human body, allowing you to create a wide range of natural-looking poses as you wish, including actions when he is wielding the mighty Gavvwhipir.
